about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Unique gameplay X Hot aphrodisiacs
Spring X Elixir is a moderate-paced and light turn-based shmups (STG). Its main gameplay is to collect and combine the Five Elements (Metal, Wood, Water, Fire and Earth) to cast spells within the limited True Qi value. Simply hold down your right mouse button and draw a line by dragging the mouse to block bullets and attack targets so that you can defeat the evil spirits!
There are over 30 kinds of Five Element combination spells, as well as many unlockable Magic Treasures to help you fight in Spring X Elixir

Spring X Elixir presents a modern alchemist girl named Wick Sugar (Xiaoxin Tang), who stumbles upon a mysterious sixth Spring element besides the Five Elements when slaying evil spirits on her cultivation journey. The Spring element, which has an extremely striking hallucinogenic effect, can create a realistic experience. Using this feature, Wick Sugar (Xiaoxin Tang) creates Spring Horny Aphrodisiacs to experience unimaginable pleasure at home.

Spring X Elixir uses full motion graphics and carefully designed high interactivity to show the effects of Spring Horny Aphrodisiacs.
The effect of each use of Spring Horny Aphrodisiacs will change depending on the user's skills. Try more and you may get a different experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
caution
Game stories may contain sensitive themes，Examples include alcohol, and non-consensual sex.

name: Spring X Elixir - DLC1
short_description: Spring X Elixir presents a modern alchemist girl named Wick Sugar, who stumbles upon a mysterious sixth Spring element besides the Five Elements when slaying evil spirits. Help her defeat the evil spirits, which have the Spring element, and enjoy the charm of Spring Horny Aphrodisiacs together!
